name: CNGroup
desc: An immutable object that represents a group of contacts.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The unique identifier for a group on the device.

items.name: class func predicateForGroups(withIdentifiers: [String]) -> NSPredicate
items.desc: Returns a predicate to find groups with the specified identifiers.

items.name: class func predicateForGroupsInContainer(withIdentifier: String) -> NSPredicate
items.desc: Returns a predicate to find groups in the specified container.

items.name: class func predicateForSubgroupsInGroup(withIdentifier: String) -> NSPredicate
items.desc: Returns a predicate to find subgroups in the specified parent group.
